title: The aphorismes of Hippocrates, prince of physitians with a short comment on them taken out of those larger notes of Galen, Heurnius, Fuchsius, &c. : with an exact table shewing the substance of every aphorisme.
author: Hippocrates.
notes: The translation is similar to the 1610 London ed., translated by S.H.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
"Hippocrates his life out of Soranus": p. [3-10]; "Hippocrates his oath": p. [11-13]
